titleStmt.title: D. D. An advertisement, anent the reading of the books of Antonia Borignion By George White minister at Mary-Culter near Aberdeen.
titleStmt.author: White, George, d. 1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Forbes, printer to the town and University,

notesStmt.note: A1 is blank but for black-letter signature on recto.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
